Package representation.node

Class EventDecorator

java.lang.Object
representation.node.EventDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Event
Direct Known Subclasses:
SoundNode
public abstract class EventDecorator extends Object implements Event
Represents a decorator for an event.
